name: DoomGals
summary: DoomGals is a helper mod for classic Doom that allows you to summon up to four demon girls at any time to rip and tear by your side! Each girl has her own set of attacks and unique abilities that grant the player powerups, so choose which one you think would be best to help you finish a level...or summon all four for maximum carnage if you're up against a slaughtermap and need all the help you can get!
